hearth.components package =========================c

Submodules

forge.hearth.components.base module

Various base classes for Hearth components.

class forge.hearth.components.base.UIComponent(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Protocol

Base UI component class for Hearth.

add_to_renderer(component_renderer_name: str = 'display-component-renderer', ui_renderer_name: str = 'display-ui-renderer') → None

Add the UI component and its base elements to their renderers respectively.

Parameters

  • component_renderer_name (str) – Name of the renderer to which the UI component is to be added; defaults to the base component renderer.

  • ui_renderer_name (str) – Name of the renderer to which the elements of the UI component are to be added; defaults to the base UI renderer.

children: list[forge.hearth.elements.base.UIElement | forge.hearth.components.base.UIComponent]
id() → int

Get the unique ID of the UI component.

Returns

ID of the UI component.

Return type

int

render(display: Surface) → None

Render the UI component and its elements to the display.

Parameters

display (forge.core.utils.aliases.Surface) – Display to which the UI component and its elements are to be rendered.

update() → None

Update the UI component.
